subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets extended the contract of general manager Omar Minaya through 2012 and included team options for 2013 and 2014. The team will now turn its attention to the manager, Jerry Manuel.
snippet: The Mets extended the contract of general manager Omar Minaya through 2012 and included team options for 2013 and 2014. The team will now turn its attention to the manager, Jerry Manuel.
